languages.text: "Точно разобрать не могу. На одной слепая вера, на второй злоба и коварство. И то, и другое приводят к трагедии. Вам лишь предстоит решить, какая трагедия вам больше по душе".

traits.locale_text: "Точно разобрать не могу. На одной слепая вера, на второй злоба и коварство. И то, и другое приводят к трагедии. Вам лишь предстоит решить, какая трагедия вам больше по душе".

languages.text: "I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."
languages.original_text: "Точно разобрать не могу. На одной слепая вера, на второй злоба и коварство. И то, и другое приводят к трагедии. Вам лишь предстоит решить, какая трагедия вам больше по душе".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."
"I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."
"I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."
"I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."
"I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."
"I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."

languages.text: «No sabría decirlo. Uno conduce a la fe ciega, el otro al odio y la traición. Ambos terminan en tragedia. Solo ha de decidir qué tragedia prefiere afrontar».
languages.original_text: "I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."

traits.locale_text: «No sabría decirlo. Uno conduce a la fe ciega, el otro al odio y la traición. Ambos terminan en tragedia. Solo ha de decidir qué tragedia prefiere afrontar».

languages.text: "Ich vermag es nicht zu sagen. Der eine ist mit blindem Glauben gepflastert, der andere mit Hass und Verrat. Beide führen in die Tragödie. Ihr müsst schlicht entscheiden, welche Form der Tragödie Euch am besten gefällt."
languages.original_text: "I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."

traits.locale_text: "Ich vermag es nicht zu sagen. Der eine ist mit blindem Glauben gepflastert, der andere mit Hass und Verrat. Beide führen in die Tragödie. Ihr müsst schlicht entscheiden, welche Form der Tragödie Euch am besten gefällt."

languages.text: « Je n'en sais pas plus. L'un est pavé d'une foi aveugle, l'autre de haine et de trahison. Les deux mènent à une tragédie. Il vous faut simplement choisir celle qui vous convient le mieux. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en sais pas plus. L'un est pavé d'une foi aveugle, l'autre de haine et de trahison. Les deux mènent à une tragédie. Il vous faut simplement choisir celle qui vous convient le mieux. »

languages.text: “我说不太好。一条道路由盲目的信仰铺就，而另一条道路则充斥着仇恨与背叛，两条道路都会导致悲剧。你只要选择你喜欢哪种悲剧就好。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."

traits.locale_text: “我说不太好。一条道路由盲目的信仰铺就，而另一条道路则充斥着仇恨与背叛，两条道路都会导致悲剧。你只要选择你喜欢哪种悲剧就好。”

languages.text: 「何とも言えないわね。一方は盲目的な信仰心で、もう一方は憎しみと裏切りで塗り固められている。どちらも待つのは悲劇だけ。どちらの悲劇がお好みかで決めればいいわ」
languages.original_text: "I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."

traits.locale_text: 「何とも言えないわね。一方は盲目的な信仰心で、もう一方は憎しみと裏切りで塗り固められている。どちらも待つのは悲劇だけ。どちらの悲劇がお好みかで決めればいいわ」
「何とも言えないわね。一方は盲目的な信仰心で、もう一方は憎しみと裏切りで塗り固められている。どちらも待つのは悲劇だけ。どちらの悲劇がお好みかで決めればいいわ」

languages.text: "Bilemem. Biri körü körüne inanç, diğeri nefret ve ihanet yolu. İkisinin de ucu felaket. Sana düşen, felaketlerden felaket beğenmek."
languages.original_text: "I cannot say. One is paved with blind faith, the other with hatred and treachery. Both lead to tragedy. You simply have to decide what kind of tragedy you like the most."

traits.locale_text: "Bilemem. Biri körü körüne inanç, diğeri nefret ve ihanet yolu. İkisinin de ucu felaket. Sana düşen, felaketlerden felaket beğenmek."
